page.title: 02MY DAY IN SCREDINGTON.
page.content: My name is Paul and I am seven years old.On school days I get up at 8 o'clock and get dressed then I go downstairs and have my breakfast.I get my bags and walk to school with James. We have a little play before the bell goes at 9 o'clock. First we have a little sing song, then we do maths and we write a story and we go out to play. Sometimes we watch school programmes and we have our lunch and a playtime. In the afternoon we go on the computer and we bake cakes. At three o'clock it is home time and my mum and sister come to meet me and when I get home I change my clothes and I have a drink and a cake then I go out to play. At five 0'clock my mum calls me. After tea I do my homework and sometimes I go out to play and sometimes I watch television and at 8 0'clock I have a bath and go to bed.
